K10D0168_H0169:333b-1: bi ma la bra bha ba pa ri pri tstsh'a /

K10D0168_H0169:348b-7: rgyal ba rnams kyis legs byin pa //

K10D0168_H0169:348b-9: kun tu rgyal gyis de bzhin thos //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-10: de tshe rnam thos bu la sogs //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-11: lha rnams gang dag der 'dus pa'i //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-12: bcom ldan 'das la tshig gis gsol //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-13: li yul yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-14: lhar ba dam pa mthun gyur pa //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-15: bdag cag gis ni yul yang bzung //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-16: gang tshe gser gyi rigs dag dang //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-17: skar rdo'i yul ni mdzes gyur pa //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-18: li ni dbang bar gyur pa na //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-20: de tshe lha mos gsol pa ni //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-21: skar rdo dang ni gser gyi rigs //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-22: lha rnams kyis ni bsrung ba'i phyir //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-23: rgyal ba skyes mchog stsol bar mdzod //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-24: sa 'dir sngon gyi tshe rabs su //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-25: gang tshe bdag ni dgo bsnyen ma //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-26: ming ni hu shar gyur pa na //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-27: yul 'di gnyis ni bdag gi lags //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-28: de yi 'khor du rgyal byung ba //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-29: au rgyan bdag po dbang phyug go /
K10D0168_H0169:348b-30: rgyal po stan las langs nas kyang //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-31: pus mo gnyis ni sa la btsugs //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-32: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba ni //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-33: gang gi tshe ni la yul zhes //
K10D0168_H0169:348b-35: yongs su rgyas shing skyo bo gang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-0: @349a *// de tshe skar rdo'i yul dag tu //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-1: stobs chen rgyal por bdag gyur nas //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-2: der ni li yi bdag po dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-3: rtag tu gnyen ni bgyid pa dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-4: bdag gi yul de bsrung ba'i phyir //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-5: bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bgyi //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-6: de yi tshe ni dri med 'od //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-7: lha mos smon lam 'di skad btab //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-8: gang tshe yul gyi dang po 'dir //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-9: sum pa mang po 'ong ba dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-10: gang tshe yul 'dir rgya dang ni //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-11: 'a zha dang ni sum pa rnams //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-12: 'phags skyes po yi dmag bzhin du //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-13: yul der 'ong bar gyur pa na //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-14: de tshe yul 'dir skye bo'i phyir //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-15: bdag gis skye ba blang bar bgyi //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-16: bdag gis skye ba der blangs pas //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-17: sum pa la sogs ldog gyur cig /
K10D0168_H0169:349a-18: li yul na ni gnas rnams kyis //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-19: sngon ni gang du las bgyis pa //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-20: der ni bdag kyang dga' bzhin du //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-21: bdag gis su ni las rnams bgyis //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-22: der ni sngon gyi rgyal po gang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-23: blon po khyim bdag yul mi dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-24: bdag la sdug par gyur pa dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-25: de dag dang ni bral bar 'gyur //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-26: de tshe bdag ni gcig pu sdug /
K10D0168_H0169:349a-27: mi gtsang ting 'dzin thob gyur nas //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-28: der ni skye bar gyur pa na; ;sngon gyi smon lam dran gyur cig /
K10D0168_H0169:349a-29: de tshe de yi 'khor du ni //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-30: ka spa ra yi bdag po rgyal //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-31: des ni lha mo dri med 'od //
K10D0168_H0169:349a-32: smras pa thos par gyur nas kyang //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-0: rgyal @349b po stan las langs nas ni //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-1: 'di skad kyi ni tshig kyang smras //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-2: bdag ni tshe rabs snga mar ni //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-3: mi bzad las byas gang yin pas //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-4: sh'akya rnams ni brlag pa'i phyir //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-5: bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-6: mdzes pa'i yul du lhan cig dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-7: las 'di rnam smin mi bzad pa //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-8: tshe 'di la ni mi myong bar //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-10: gang gi tshe na sum pa dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-11: 'a zha dag der dong ba dang //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-12: bdag gis sngon sh'akya'i yul du 'phags skyes po'i g-yul ngor las byas pa gang yin pa de /
K10D0168_H0169:349b-13: gang gi tshe lha mo 'di skyo ba chen por
K10D0168_H0169:349b-14: gyur pa na de'i tshe bdag 'di'i phar gyur la
K10D0168_H0169:349b-15: / bdag gi phyir 'di skyo bar gyur cing dang por gzungs thob pa bzhin du /
K10D0168_H0169:349b-16: des bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0168_H0169:349b-17: rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa 'khor de nyid
K10D0168_H0169:349b-18: kyi nang na 'dug pa des smon lam btab pa
K10D0168_H0169:349b-19: de'i tshe bdag kyang lha mo dri ma med pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:349b-20: 'od kyi mar gyur la bdag gis 'phags skyes po'i
K10D0168_H0169:349b-21: dmag slar ldog la sdig pa'i las chen po 'di
K10D0168_H0169:349b-22: lta bu byas te ci bya zhes gyod btab pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:349b-23: dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa des na
K10D0168_H0169:349b-24: li yul der bdag 'chi ba'i dus la ma bab
K10D0168_H0169:349b-25: kyi bar du / bdag gis li yul de nyid du mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas /
K10D0168_H0169:349b-26: gang gi tshe yul der 'a zha dang /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-1: bdag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams
K10D0168_H0169:350a-2: bde ba can du skye bar gyur cig ces byas
K10D0168_H0169:350a-3: so // lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i
K10D0168_H0169:350a-4: ming po rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu gang yin
K10D0168_H0169:350a-5: pa de'ang shin tu nga rgyal che zhing rgyags pas
K10D0168_H0169:350a-6: g-yul 'gyed pa blta ba'i phyir sh'akya'i g-yul der rgyal
K10D0168_H0169:350a-7: po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la 'ongs nas
K10D0168_H0169:350a-8: so // / des kyang g-yul der mi bsad pa la sogs pa'i sdig byas te /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-9: gang gi tshe der sems can mang po shi ba mthong ba de'i tshe /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-10: des sangs rgyas mthong nas 'gyod pa chen po dang skyo bar gyur cing /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-11: de'i tshe des lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la smras pa /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-12: da ni khyod kyi ming po shin tu sdug pa
K10D0168_H0169:350a-13: yin pas ngas dmag de'i nang du sdig pa'i las
K10D0168_H0169:350a-14: byas pa khyod kyis thos nas rjes su yi rangs
K10D0168_H0169:350a-15: par gyur te / khyod kyi yid kyis mi dge
K10D0168_H0169:350a-16: ba thob par gyur pa gang yin pa'i las kyi
K10D0168_H0169:350a-17: rnam par smin pa des na khyod kyi yul du
K10D0168_H0169:350a-18: sum pa'i dmag 'ong bar gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-19: de'i tshe'ang da ltar ji lta ba bzhin du der nga khyod kyi sdug pa'i ming por gyur la /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-20: khyod kyis gcig pu lung med par mi gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-21: khyod kyis thog ma kho nar gzungs thob par gyur pa bzhin du /
K10D0168_H0169:350a-22: de'i tshe nga'ang khyod kyi mthus sems can dmyal ba dang /
K10D0168_H0169:350b-0: dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal rnams @350b las thar bar gyur
K10D0168_H0169:350b-1: nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po rnam thos kyi bu'i
K10D0168_H0169:350b-2: g-yog byed pa'i gnod sbyin a'a dzu la zhes bya
K10D0168_H0169:350b-3: bar gyur la des rtag tu khyod bsrung zhing ngas
K10D0168_H0169:350b-4: rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa de dag dang
K10D0168_H0169:350b-5: / gnod sbyin gzhan de dag dang /
K10D0168_H0169:350b-6: lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu lha'i rgyal po de dag la dran par bskul te /
K10D0168_H0169:350b-7: gang gi tshe khyod la dgongs pa de'i tshe 'ongs
K10D0168_H0169:350b-8: nas ci 'dod pa sgrub bar gyur cig ces smras
K10D0168_H0169:350b-9: so // der lha mo de nyid kyi bu mo
K10D0168_H0169:350b-10: tha chung rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur
K10D0168_H0169:350b-11: pa des smon lam btab pa /
K10D0168_H0169:350b-12: bdag gi ming po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla
K10D0168_H0169:350b-13: la sdig pa'i las byas pa bdag gis thos nas
K10D0168_H0169:350b-14: dga' bar gyur pa'i las des na der yang khyod
K10D0168_H0169:350b-15: kyi bu mor gyur la gang gi tshe las de'i
K10D0168_H0169:350b-16: rnam par smin pas bdag mya ngan gyis 'chi ba'i
K10D0168_H0169:350b-17: dus byed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe khyod de ltar
K10D0168_H0169:350b-18: bur skyo bar gyur pas na /
K10D0168_H0169:350b-19: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed nas chos gang
K10D0168_H0169:350b-20: gis 'bras bu dang po thob ste; sdug bsngal mthar
K10D0168_H0169:350b-21: byed par 'gyur ba'i de lta bu'i chos thos nas
K10D0168_H0169:350b-23: phyi ma'i las rnams dran par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0168_H0169:350b-24: der lha mo de'i ming po tha chung du gyur cing //
K10D0168_H0169:350b-25: dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa
K10D0168_H0169:350b-26: phyin chad de'i ming por gyur pa de'i sngon gyi
K10D0168_H0169:350b-27: las kyis sems can rnams skrag par byed pa des
K10D0168_H0169:351a-1: 'das kyis spyan sngar smon lam 'debs pa'ang mthong la /
K10D0168_H0169:351a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam btab nas
K10D0168_H0169:351a-3: li yul gyi yul 'khor yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir
K10D0168_H0169:351a-5: de nas lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi
K10D0168_H0169:351a-6: ming po tha chung rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bus
K10D0168_H0169:351a-7: bcom ldan 'das ga na ba de logs su thal
K10D0168_H0169:351a-8: mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0168_H0169:351a-9: // sngon bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te /
K10D0168_H0169:351a-10: dus thams cad du skyes par gyur nas rgyal srid kyi bgyi ba mang po'ang bgyis so //
K10D0168_H0169:351a-11: bdag gi sring mo 'di'ang bud med kyi gzugs kyis
K10D0168_H0169:351a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags te
K10D0168_H0169:351a-13: / 'dis li yul yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du
K10D0168_H0169:351a-14: sug par blangs pa de ni las chen po mchis
K10D0168_H0169:351a-16: bud med kyi bsam pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par bas so //
K10D0168_H0169:351a-18: ci nas kyang bdag gi steng du 'od zer rnams
K10D0168_H0169:351a-19: btang ba de lta bur bdag la byin gyis brlab
K10D0168_H0169:351a-20: par gsol // ci nas kyang yul bsrung ba'i slad du grogs bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0168_H0169:351a-21: bdag gi rigs kyis yun ring por li yul du
K10D0168_H0169:351a-22: yul 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyang
K10D0168_H0169:351b-1: skye ba blangs te 'bras bu thob nas gum pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:351b-2: 'og tu lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur
K10D0168_H0169:351b-3: cig / gang gi tshe li yul du sum pa'am /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-4: gdong dmar rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag skar rdo'i yul gyi rgyal por gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-5: lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i ming por byung la /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-6: li yul dar bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag de'i grogs bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0168_H0169:351b-7: gang gi tshe gzhon nu des de skad ces gsol nas /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-9: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal
K10D0168_H0169:351b-10: ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
K10D0168_H0169:351b-11: zhugs so // lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char phab ste /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-12: lha'i sil snyan rnams dkrol lo //
K10D0168_H0169:351b-13: bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-14: ngas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-15: bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag dang /
K10D0168_H0169:351b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag ji lta
K10D0168_H0169:351b-17: ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mang po
K10D0168_H0169:351b-18: mdzad mdzad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po
K10D0168_H0169:351b-19: de dag dang / cho 'phrul de dag ngas dus
K10D0168_H0169:351b-20: gcig tu bsdus te brtul bas ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0168_H0169:351b-21: su lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'dis yongs
K10D0168_H0169:351b-22: su bskyang ba'i phyir lag tu blangs pa'i li yul
K10D0168_H0169:351b-23: gyi yul 'khor rab tu gnas par bya'o //
K10D0168_H0169:352a-1: nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:352a-2: phyogs gang du li yul dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352a-3: thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa
K10D0168_H0169:352a-4: la gandha'i mchod rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs der
K10D0168_H0169:352a-5: bzhugs so // bcom ldan 'das der bzhugs bzhin du
K10D0168_H0169:352a-6: dpal thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting
K10D0168_H0169:352a-7: nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
K10D0168_H0169:352a-8: ye shes sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer btang ngo //
K10D0168_H0169:352a-9: bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa'i 'khor
K10D0168_H0169:352a-10: de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnas gcig na 'khod
K10D0168_H0169:352a-11: bzhin du bcom ldan 'das gang du li yul 'byung
K10D0168_H0169:352a-12: bar 'gyur ba'i phyogs de na skyil mo krung bcas
K10D0168_H0169:352a-14: thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas ri glang ru
K10D0168_H0169:352a-15: zhes bya ba de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
K10D0168_H0169:352a-16: dpa' sngon bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa byang chub
K10D0168_H0169:352a-17: sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na grogs su gyur
K10D0168_H0169:352a-18: ba gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 'od zer
K10D0168_H0169:352a-20: bcom ldan 'das nyid ni gang du go ma sa
K10D0168_H0169:352a-21: la gandhe'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'byung
K10D0168_H0169:352a-22: bar 'gyur ba de'i bar snang la bzhugs so //
K10D0168_H0169:352a-23: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352a-24: gang dag tu dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-2: mchod rten chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i nang gi padma'i steng de dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-4: de nas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs
K10D0168_H0169:352b-5: sngags gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
K10D0168_H0169:352b-6: chos thams cad thugs su chud par 'gyur ba'i gzungs
K10D0168_H0169:352b-7: sngags kyi spyi bo zhes bya ba 'di bshad do
K10D0168_H0169:352b-13: sad dha rma ba ba ra /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-15: sarba dharma skan dha ba ba ra /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-16: badzra p'a ni ba ba ra /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-17: tishtha te ba ba ra sv'ah'a /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-18: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs
K10D0168_H0169:352b-19: sngags 'di bshad pa'i tshe bya rgod kyi phung po'i
K10D0168_H0169:352b-20: ri la gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis thos so
K10D0168_H0169:352b-21: // ri glang ru'i zom na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-22: thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo //
K10D0168_H0169:352b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-24: gzhon nu rdo rje sde la bka' stsal pa /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-25: khyod kyis gzungs sngags 'dis nga'i las gyis la /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-26: li yul gyi yul 'khor khyod la gtad pas yongs su bsrung bar gyis shig /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-27: de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K10D0168_H0169:352b-28: byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje sdes 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0168_H0169:352b-30: li yul gtad pa 'di bdag cag gis nod par 'tshal lo ////
K10D0168_H0169:353a-0: @353a *// dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa /
K10D0168_H0169:353a-2: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od dang /
K10D0168_H0169:353a-3: gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i don gyi phyir gzungs sngags gzhan bshad pa /
K10D0168_H0169:353a-8: bha thi te dharma skan dha aa pa ra dzi te /
K10D0168_H0169:353a-11: de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying
K10D0168_H0169:353a-12: po la sogs pa gang dag la lha mo dri
K10D0168_H0169:353a-13: ma med pa'i 'od kyis sngon sangs rgyas nyid du
K10D0168_H0169:353a-14: thog ma sems bskyed pa de dag kyang der gshegs
K10D0168_H0169:353a-15: so // gzhon nu rdo rje sdes kyang yon phul lo //
K10D0168_H0169:353a-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun
K10D0168_H0169:353a-17: tu gzigs pa de las sngon sangs rgyas nyid du
K10D0168_H0169:353a-19: dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
K10D0168_H0169:353a-20: 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba der byang chub

K10D0168_H0169:361b-6: gzhu la bzlas brjod byas sam /

K10D0168_H0169:385a-24: dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i chu dang /

K10D0168_H0169:385a-26: mar la bzlas brjod byas nas mgo bo dang khar
K10D0168_H0169:385a-27: bskus na mgo bo'i nad thams cad las thar bar
K10D0168_H0169:385a-28: 'gyur ro // 'thungs na dran pa skye bar 'gyur ro //

K10D0168_H0169:385b-0: gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs kyang rung @385b ste; 'di las

K10D0168_H0169:385b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan phyogs re rer brjod par bya'o //

K10D0168_H0169:385b-9: gzungs sngags 'di dag ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu

K10D0168_H0169:385b-11: pa ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du thams cad

K10D0168_H0169:385b-14: des 'di skad du bdag gis gang gi tshe sangs
K10D0168_H0169:385b-15: rgyas kyi byang chub thob nas dgrol bar bya'o zhes
K10D0168_H0169:385b-16: byas so // de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis /
K10D0168_H0169:385b-18: ji ltar bdag gis gzungs sngags 'di dag gis ming
K10D0168_H0169:385b-19: po thar par byas pa de bzhin du sems can
K10D0168_H0169:385b-20: thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gis yongs su

K10D0168_H0169:386a-3: gang gi tshe gzhon nu sdig can byung ba na
K10D0168_H0169:386a-4: mi rgod byung ba de dag rgyal po'i thad du
K10D0168_H0169:386a-5: btang ste / blon po chen po gtso bo'i khyim du song nas nor rnams khyer ro //

K10D0168_H0169:386a-7: med cig nyal ba de dag sang shor gyis dogs

K10D0168_H0169:386a-12: nor rnams kyang blon po chen po de dag gi mdun du bzhag go /
K10D0168_H0169:386a-13: de nas blon po chen po gtso bo de khong dge ba zhig ste /
K10D0168_H0169:386a-14: bdag gi nor nyi tshe'i ngo blangs so //
K10D0168_H0169:386a-15: de nas blon po chen po gtso bo de'i sring
K10D0168_H0169:386a-16: mo mtshan mo mi nyal bar 'chags na 'chags pas

K10D0168_H0169:386a-22: blon po chen po gcig shos kyis bu dang /
K10D0168_H0169:386a-23: chung ma khyer ba de'ang rgyal pos ma rmas so //

K10D0168_H0169:386b-0: chung ma rnams kyang mi rgod de dag gis mtshan mo @386b brkus te rang gi bu dang /
K10D0168_H0169:386b-1: chung ma ni phyir ma thob bo //

K10D0168_H0169:386b-4: nged kyis khyed kyi chung ma 'phrog par gyur cig ces byas so //

K10D0168_H0169:386b-6: nas bud med khrid de song ba des smon lam
K10D0168_H0169:386b-7: btab pa / bdag blon po chen po khyed kyi
K10D0168_H0169:386b-8: 'khor du skyes te gang gi tshe khyod las byed
K10D0168_H0169:386b-9: btab pa / pa de'i tshe / ngas khyod kyi
K10D0168_H0169:386b-10: sems dkrug cing gtam ngan chen po sgrogs par gyur
K10D0168_H0169:386b-12: de nas rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gang gis
K10D0168_H0169:386b-13: mi rgod 'ong ba tshor ba de la dris pa
K10D0168_H0169:386b-14: / ngas tshor ro zhes khyod kyis bya ste /

K10D0168_H0169:386b-19: mdza' bo'i tshul du 'dug cing dgar byed par gyur

K10D0168_H0169:386b-23: blon po chen po gcig shos kyi nu bo ni shad ku la zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //

K10D0168_H0169:387a-2: gnyis las gcig ni aa kun zhes bya bar 'gyur
K10D0168_H0169:387a-3: ro // gcig ni tu pa la zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:387a-4: de'i chung ma smon lam 'debs pa gnyis las gcig
K10D0168_H0169:387a-5: ni mya ngan dang bral ba zhes bya bar 'gyur

K10D0168_H0169:387a-7: blon po chen po de'i chung ma mdzod kyi sgo
K10D0168_H0169:387a-8: na nyal nyal ba de ni pi da ku la'i
K10D0168_H0169:387a-9: chung ma las skar rdo'i rgyal pos khyer ba yin
K10D0168_H0169:387a-10: no // mi rgod rnams kyi mar gyur pa de
K10D0168_H0169:387a-11: ni mi rgod 'dzin pa rnams kyi mar gyur te
K10D0168_H0169:387a-12: no // / de'ang de'i grogs su 'gyur ro //

K10D0168_H0169:387a-14: ci nas bdag pag mar btang nas khyod la gsod par gyur cig ces byas so //

K10D0168_H0169:387a-20: chung ma 'phrog par byed pa'i mi rgod de dag
K10D0168_H0169:387a-21: gis kyang blon po chen po de la 'di skad
K10D0168_H0169:387a-22: ces smras te smon lam bdab ba //
K10D0168_H0169:387a-23: khyod kyis chos bzhin du byas te yus yod bzhin
K10D0168_H0169:387b-0: du btang nas rang gi nor nyi @387b tshe'i ngo
K10D0168_H0169:387b-1: blangs pas na khyod dge ba ci rtsom yang rung
K10D0168_H0169:387b-2: ste / der bdag cag khyod kyi grogs su gyur cig ces byas so //
K10D0168_H0169:387b-3: sngon du pa la li'i rgyal ba'i mir gyur pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:387b-4: tshe smon lam btab pas na skar rdo'i rgyal po'i
K10D0168_H0169:387b-6: nam de'i dus la bab pa na skar rdo'i rgyal
K10D0168_H0169:387b-7: po'i pid ku li'i chung ma khyer bar 'gyur te
K10D0168_H0169:387b-8: / de'i tshe pid ku las gtam ngan chen po
K10D0168_H0169:387b-9: bsgrags nas mi de'i bsams pa las na lus 'di
K10D0168_H0169:387b-10: ci zhig bya snyam nas de'i tshe skyo ba chen

K10D0168_H0169:387b-13: 'di ni bud med du skye ba'i tha ma yin te /
K10D0168_H0169:387b-14: sangs rgyas kyi bka' 'di dran par bya'o snyam mo //

K10D0168_H0169:387b-17: der gang gis tshe rabs dran par gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K10D0168_H0169:387b-19: de nas ring po mi thogs par [?] dpal [?] de gdong dmar rnams 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:387b-20: de dag thog ipma li yul du 'gro 'dod pa
K10D0168_H0169:387b-21: de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das de dag

K10D0168_H0169:387b-23: gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang /
K10D0168_H0169:387b-24: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-0: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rnams ka pi la na'i @388a *//
K10D0168_H0169:388a-1: mchod rten du thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-2: der bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gzungs sngags bshad do //
K10D0168_H0169:388a-3: de'i tshe der mchod rten de nyid las 'di ltar
K10D0168_H0169:388a-4: byang phyogs pa la sogs pa'i dmag 'ong bar 'gyur
K10D0168_H0169:388a-5: te / shin tu mi bzad pa yin no zhes sgra rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //

K10D0168_H0169:388a-8: 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa de dag thams cad mya ngan gyi go bgos nas /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-11: gdong dmar rnams kyi dmag 'ongs te; dri gtsang khang dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-13: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams kyang 'jig par byed kyi /

K10D0168_H0169:388a-16: bdag gis bgyi ba gang lags pa de bka' stsol cig dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-17: yul gyi phyir ci ste bdag gi srog yal du zin kyang de la chags pa med do //
K10D0168_H0169:388a-18: de nas lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0168_H0169:388a-19: 'di la thabs gcig kho na zhig yod de /
K10D0168_H0169:388a-20: ci nas yul gyi mi thams cad kyis theg pa
K10D0168_H0169:388a-21: chen po'i mdo dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i mdo
K10D0168_H0169:388a-22: nyi shu rtsa gcig bris la dam pa'i chos padma
K10D0168_H0169:388a-23: dkar po chos kyi rnam grangs kyi srung ma'i lha
K10D0168_H0169:388b-0: de dag dang / mdo de las ming smos @388b pa'i srin po dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388b-1: srin mo gang yin pa de dag la chos kyi
K10D0168_H0169:388b-2: sbyin pa bya ba'i phyir aa shva dam pa'i mchod
K10D0168_H0169:388b-3: rten chen po bklag par bya ste /
K10D0168_H0169:388b-4: ro dang ldan pa'i zas rnams kyang gzhag par bya'o //
K10D0168_H0169:388b-5: mar me de dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
K10D0168_H0169:388b-6: de nas dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis 'di skad ces smras so //
K10D0168_H0169:388b-7: bdag gis yul gyi phyir thams cad la 'drir gzhug pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388b-8: klog tu gzhug par bsgo ba'i mthu de lta bu bdag la med kyi /

K10D0168_H0169:388b-10: mar me de dag kyang sbyar ro //
K10D0168_H0169:388b-11: gang gi tshe dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis dam pa'i chos padma dkar po klog pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:388b-12: ro dang ldan pa'i zas rnams gzhag par rtsom pa

K10D0168_H0169:394b-34: sangga ma nu sma r'a h'i /

K10D0168_H0169:394b-49: bo dhi satv'a ya; mah'a satv'a ya /
K10D0168_H0169:394b-56: a'ary'a ba lo ke te shva r'a ya sv'ah'a /

K10D0168_H0169:395a-9: de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di'ang gser gyi padma'i cho ga
K10D0168_H0169:395a-10: mchod pa'i skabs su bshad pa de bzhin du brjod
K10D0168_H0169:395a-11: par bya'o // de'i tshe mdo 'di'ang gser gyi rigs kyi yul du bskur bar bya'o //

K10D0168_H0169:395a-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i phyag mtshan li'i yul
K10D0168_H0169:395a-14: 'khor der mi ji snyed skye bar 'gyur ba de

K10D0168_H0169:395a-22: do // de la li'i yul 'khor de ci'i phyir yang dang yang du gzhig par 'dod la /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-0: gzhig nus @395b par yang mi 'gyur zhes the tshom 'byung ste /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-1: des na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na
K10D0168_H0169:395b-2: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
K10D0168_H0169:395b-3: lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya sangs
K10D0168_H0169:395b-4: rgyas kyi bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar du
K10D0168_H0169:395b-5: rtag tu yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te
K10D0168_H0169:395b-6: / sum brgya ni dge slong dang /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-7: dge slong ma'i tshul du gnas so //
K10D0168_H0169:395b-8: nyis brgya ni dge bsnyen dang /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-14: byis pa'i tshul du gnas te /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-15: byang chub sems dpa' de dag li yul 'khor der sems can la phan pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-16: bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir li yul du gnas so //

K10D0168_H0169:395b-18: mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:395b-19: mdo zhu bar byed pa'i gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di
K10D0168_H0169:395b-20: ni dge slong brtson 'grus las byung ba de yin
K10D0168_H0169:395b-22: de'i tshe ci'i phyir li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur zhe na /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas de dag dang /
K10D0168_H0169:395b-25: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis
K10D0168_H0169:395b-26: ci nas der bdag cag sum pa rnams kyi mchod
K10D0168_H0169:395b-27: rten dang / dri gtsang khang dang /
K10D0168_H0169:396a-0: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams 'jig @396a *//
K10D0168_H0169:396a-1: par mi 'gyur bar yul de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0168_H0169:396a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pas ka pi la
K10D0168_H0169:396a-3: na'i mchod rten la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:396a-4: dri ma med pa'i dpal tsandan gyi snying po dang
K10D0168_H0169:396a-5: thabs gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do
K10D0168_H0169:396a-7: de'i tshe grong khyer der mir gyur pa dge slong dang /
K10D0168_H0169:396a-10: skye bo mang po 'byung ba de dag sum pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /
K10D0168_H0169:396a-11: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams gzhig tu
K10D0168_H0169:396a-12: 'ong ngo snyam ste shin tu yid mi bde bar
K10D0168_H0169:396a-13: 'gyur ro // de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
K10D0168_H0169:396a-14: de dag gis ka pi la na'i mchod rten de'i
K10D0168_H0169:396a-15: srung ma'i mir 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag

K10D0168_H0169:396a-17: 'das grong khyer du gshegs par bya'o snyam du sems
K10D0168_H0169:396a-18: kyi rtog pa skyes par mdzad do //

K10D0168_H0169:396a-20: gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe ka pi la

K10D0168_H0169:396a-22: kyi 'byung gnas rnams gshegs par 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:396a-23: lha rnams kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'dul bar mdzad do //
K10D0168_H0169:396a-24: de'i tshe de'i nub mo dri ma med pa'i 'od
K10D0168_H0169:396b-0: las rab @396b nges zhes bya bar gyur pa lha
K10D0168_H0169:396b-1: rnams du ba'i sgra thos so //
K10D0168_H0169:396b-2: du ba'i sgra thos nas grong khyer 'dir sdig can

K10D0168_H0169:396b-5: 'das rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so //

K10D0168_H0169:396b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du bzhugs pa
K10D0168_H0169:396b-8: ji lta ba bzhin du grong khyer gyi sgo nas
K10D0168_H0169:396b-9: gshegs su gsol bar byed do //

K10D0168_H0169:396b-11: du gshegs par gyur pa de na sangs rgyas bcom
K10D0168_H0169:396b-12: ldan 'das gang dag gis 'od zer btang ba dang
K10D0168_H0169:396b-13: / de dag las tshig de dag 'byung ba de
K10D0168_H0169:396b-14: dag gis rab nges de la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i
K10D0168_H0169:396b-15: dus na 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du grags
K10D0168_H0169:396b-16: pa zhes bya bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos
K10D0168_H0169:396b-17: rnam par sgrogs pa phyag na rin chen mdzod bsnams
K10D0168_H0169:396b-18: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thob
K10D0168_H0169:396b-19: / par 'gyur ro // de'i tshe rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:396b-20: ka bi la na'i mchod rten gyi drung du sangs
K10D0168_H0169:396b-21: rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de dag
K10D0168_H0169:396b-22: gser gyi yul gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams
K10D0168_H0169:396b-23: dang thabs gcig tu 'ongs par 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:396b-24: ci nas sum pa rnams kyi phran byed pa de
K10D0168_H0169:396b-25: las thar bar bya ba'i phyir de sngon gyi ma
K10D0168_H0169:397a-2: de nas gtam de grags par gyur nas sum pa rnams phyir ni ldog par 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:397a-3: de nas de'i tshe der rab nges des phyis 'khor
K10D0168_H0169:397a-4: du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i sems can phal po
K10D0168_H0169:397a-6: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0168_H0169:397a-8: ma 'ongs pa na ci'i phyir na bdag sum pas li'i yul du dri gtsang khang dang /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-9: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab rnams gshig par 'gyur snyam du the tshom za bar gyur tam /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-10: yang na sum pa 'di dag la ci'i phyir bdag ces bya zhes na /

K10D0168_H0169:397a-12: de'i yul du kun tu rgyu byang chub ces bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-13: rgyal po tshangs byin des yul nas bskrad nas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi yul du phyin te /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-14: bdag 'dir phan tshun du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza'o snyam ste /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-15: der lo ma'i spyil po zhig byas nas 'dug go /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-16: de nas bud med gzhan zhig jo bo'i ba 'tsho
K10D0168_H0169:397a-17: zhing 'dug pa des kun tu rgyu de mthong nas
K10D0168_H0169:397a-19: nyin gcig bzhin du bdag gi kha zas la longs
K10D0168_H0169:397a-20: spyod cig ces kha zas la mgron du gnyer to
K10D0168_H0169:397a-21: // ba de dag bud med de nyid dbang ba ma yin te /
K10D0168_H0169:397a-22: ngo bo'i yin pas na kun tu rgyu la kha
K10D0168_H0169:397b-0: zas byin pa gang yin @397b pa de ni der
K10D0168_H0169:397b-2: bdag mi dbang ba'i 'o ma kun tu rgyu la
K10D0168_H0169:397b-3: byin pa gang yin pa de ni ma byin par
K10D0168_H0169:397b-5: de nas ba lang de dag gi bdag por gyur
K10D0168_H0169:397b-6: pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni sh'akya'i yul du
K10D0168_H0169:397b-9: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi
K10D0168_H0169:397b-10: bstan pa bdag gis gshig par gyur cig ces smon
K10D0168_H0169:397b-11: lam btab ste / de'ang gzhan yin par mi lta yi /
K10D0168_H0169:397b-12: sum pa'i rgyal po gang li yul 'jig par byed pa de yin no //
K10D0168_H0169:397b-13: kun tu rgyur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
K10D0168_H0169:397b-14: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa nga yin no; ;bud
K10D0168_H0169:397b-15: med gang gis kun tu rgyu la 'o ma byin
K10D0168_H0169:397b-16: pa de ni rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gang
K10D0168_H0169:397b-17: gis sangs rgyas dka' ba spyod pa spyad nas bzhengs
K10D0168_H0169:397b-18: pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bul ba 'di yin
K10D0168_H0169:397b-19: no // de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0168_H0169:397b-20: nga'i yul der sum pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:397b-21: gdong dmar dag 'ong ba de'i rgyu ni 'di yin te /
K10D0168_H0169:397b-22: rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste /
K10D0168_H0169:397b-23: de'i tshe rgyal po nga'i yul na bud med gzhan
K10D0168_H0169:397b-24: zhig la bu zhig yod pa de zhing rmo ba'i
K10D0168_H0169:397b-25: phyir phyi rol tu byung ngo //
K10D0168_H0169:397b-26: der mi gzhan zhig gis kyang de'i 'dab tu zhing rmos so //
K10D0168_H0169:397b-27: de nas bud med de'i bus mi de'i rkyal pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:398a-3: gdong dmar rnams li yul du 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-4: bud med de'i bu gang gis phye dang /
K10D0168_H0169:398a-7: zong khyer ba de ni li'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-8: mi gang gis rkyal pa la sogs pa rdzas phrogs
K10D0168_H0169:398a-9: pa de ni de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi rgyal por
K10D0168_H0169:398a-10: 'gyur ro // ba de dag ni de'i tshe dmag mir 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-11: mi de'i mar gyur pa'i bud med de ni de'i tshe li yul gyi rgyal po'i mar 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-12: ma byin par len pa byed pa'i mi de'i mas ni phye de blangs te /
K10D0168_H0169:398a-13: sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong grong khyer
K10D0168_H0169:398a-14: mdzes zhes bya ba la bsod snyoms su phul te
K10D0168_H0169:398a-15: / dge ba'i rtsa ba des na'ang mir skye ba thob par 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-16: mi de ni ma la phye byin pa dang /
K10D0168_H0169:398a-17: mas kyang dge slong grong khyer mdzes la phul ba
K10D0168_H0169:398a-18: de de'i bsod nams bsags pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus
K10D0168_H0169:398a-19: na li yul du dpa' sbyed ces bya bar 'gyur
K10D0168_H0169:398a-20: te / rgyu des na rnam par rgyal ba'i go
K10D0168_H0169:398a-21: cha zhes bya bar yang gyur nas rgyal srid thob
K10D0168_H0169:398a-22: te / par gyur te / skar rdor g-yul 'gyed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-23: phye sbyin par byed pa de ni rgyu des na mir skye ba thob par 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:398a-24: mi des lam gyi 'gram na 'bras rmos so //
K10D0168_H0169:398a-25: der mi gang dag gis 'bras chan chud gzan par
K10D0168_H0169:398a-26: byas pa de dag ni de'i tshe dge slong du
K10D0168_H0169:398b-0: 'gyur te / des na de dag @398b gis dge
K10D0168_H0169:398b-1: 'dun gyi nor yul gyi glud du 'jal bar 'gyur
K10D0168_H0169:398b-2: 'gyur te / ro // der bya sna tshogs kyis
K10D0168_H0169:398b-3: 'bras zos pa gang yin pa de dag ni de'i
K10D0168_H0169:398b-4: tshe li'i rgyal po'i bran du 'gyur ro //
K10D0168_H0169:398b-5: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10D0168_H0169:398b-7: li yul du mi rgod mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:398b-8: de dag gis ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu dge
K10D0168_H0169:398b-9: byed skyes pa de la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro
K10D0168_H0169:398b-10: // gang gi tshe sdig byed skyes pa na de la gnod pa byed par 'gyur te /
K10D0168_H0169:398b-11: de'i tshe mi rgod lnga brgya po de dag rgyal po yab kyi thad du gtong bar 'gyur ro //

K10D0168_H0169:398b-14: mchod rten gyi nor chud gzon par byed do //
K10D0168_H0169:398b-15: mi rgod de dag kyang sngon ma byin par len
K10D0168_H0169:398b-16: pa byed byed pa'i phyir yan lag bcang nas bsad
K10D0168_H0169:398b-17: pa des na de dag gis kyang li'i rgyal po
K10D0168_H0169:398b-18: rnam par rgyal ba'i grags pa gsod par 'gyur ro
K10D0168_H0169:398b-19: // ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mi rgod de dag

K10D0168_H0169:411a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0168_H0169:411b-0: sangs rgyas kyi @411b zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi
K10D0168_H0169:411b-1: nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la
K10D0168_H0169:411b-2: sbyin pa byin pa pas ni /
